source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Crochet Basics - Learn to Crochet Within a Week!

visible_instructors.title: Emese Liliom
visible_instructors.name: Emese
visible_instructors.job_title: E-learning and marketing specialist, crochet teacher

items.headline: Learn to Crochet with this easy step by step course in one week! I explain the stitches, signs and techniques in detail.
objectives_summary: crochet, even if you have never done it before
make simple items such as a heart, granny square, triangle, filet blocks, circle, flower and a spiral shell
reading the crochet charts, and understanding the signs

items.title: How to Draw Manga Faces and Hair
items.headline: Learn to draw Manga and Anime faces like a pro
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of the manga head
Learn to draw the facial features, eyes, nose, mouth, hair
Learn to add emotions to your faces

items.title: The Ultimate Sketching Course - Amateur to Pro
items.headline: Learn to sketch like a true artist!
objectives_summary: Learn the fundamentals of shape
Learn the fundamentals of form
Learn the fundamentals of perspective

items.title: 25 Days to Better Drawings
items.headline: The Core Concepts to Drawing - One Day at a Time
objectives_summary: How to balance observation with mark making.
How to loosen up for greater accuracy in your drawings.
How to break complex subjects down into easy to draw shapes.

items.title: Candle Making for Beginners - for Fun or to Build a Business

visible_instructors.title: Kevin Partner
visible_instructors.name: Kevin
visible_instructors.job_title: Professional Candle Maker, Writer and Instructional Designer

items.headline: Learn how to easily make gorgeous candles to use yourself, give to others or to start your own craft business
objectives_summary: Make a range of beautiful candles at home using standard kitchen equipment
Choose the right wax and wick combination for each candle
Decide how much candle fragrance and dye to use for each candle

items.title: Complete Drawing Course: Ultimate Drawing Art with Pencil

visible_instructors.title: Homa Tayefeh
visible_instructors.name: Homa
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

visible_instructors.title: Matin Shafiei
visible_instructors.name: Matin
visible_instructors.job_title: Colored Pencil and Ballpoint Pen Drawing Artist

items.headline: Learn the Basic of Drawing Techniques and Complete Sketching and Art with Pencil Drawing From Beginner to Advanced Draw
objectives_summary: Acquaintance with pencil drawing tools like pencils, Brushes and fader
How to shade a Spherical with different light angle
How to draw different lines and volumes

items.title: How to Draw Anime People and bodies
items.headline: Learn how to draw amazing anime or manga bodies. Master the unique style of manga and anime with this course.
objectives_summary: In this course, you will learn to the proportions of anime bodies
How to draw all ages, from toddlers on up
How to draw in the unique anime/manga style

items.title: Portrait Drawing The Smart Way
items.headline: Lessons and Exercises for Drawing Accurate Portraits
objectives_summary: Draw portraits with accuracy that actually look like the subject.
Draw facial features from a variety of angles using a methodical approach that can be applied to any subject.
Use a combination of graphite and charcoal to develop realistic skin textures and convincing facial features.

items.title: How to draw CARTOONY HUMANS
items.headline: Learn about male and female proportions and how to make them look cartoony. Find your own style in cartooning!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to draw HUMAN PROPORTION and how to make humans look CARTOONY.
You will learn how to find your own style and design your own cartoony humans.
You will learn how to keep the same style of cartoonying if you are designing your book and characters for your animated movie.

items.title: Wood Carving for Beginners

visible_instructors.title: Sharon Elliott
visible_instructors.name: Sharon
visible_instructors.job_title: Phoenix based Artist (Woodcarver, Painter, Basket weaver)

items.headline: Come discover the world of wood carving. You will learn all about tools, basic cuts and create you own carving
objectives_summary: Gathering the correct carving tools
step by step carving my famous Little People
Master the 4 basic wood carving cuts

items.title: Tattoo for Beginners
items.headline: Tattoo course by Sally Nassar
objectives_summary: The difference between coil & rotary machines & how to assemble them
Different types and sizes of needles & their usages
Stencil creation and transfer to human skin

items.title: Positive Psychology Art Coaching
items.headline: Art activities for children to help build confidence & selfesteem
objectives_summary: Do you want to help improve self-esteem, confidence and overall well-being in children? Do you want to cultivate their creativity and help them in self expression all along while engaging in fun activities? Positive Art is an amazing tool that can be used with children whether you are a parent, a teacher or in your life coaching business with children and adults alike.

Art creation can help process pain and emotions, lessen stress, increase focus and clarity and get one into flow which has a positive impact on well-being.   Throughout history art has been used for communication and form of expression as our minds comprehend forms and symbols at a much deeper level than language. Simply put art is used as a form of expression when words are just not enough.

This course is filled with fun, engaging research based positive art activities that are designed specifically for use with children of any age. Children will learn to empower themselves, through self exploration, creativity and coping strategies. They will learn more about growth mind set, positive self talk, visualization and learning about their strengths, all aspects that will help rewire their brains to improve their mind set.

items.title: Watercolor painting for the complete beginner - First steps
items.headline: Start painting in watercolors with this easy guide to the basic techniques. All you need to paint your first pictures.
objectives_summary: ​At the end of the course you will have learned all the basics of watercolor painting, and you will have created two amazing paintings in watercolors.

items.title: Art for Beginners: Learn to Paint Acrylic Paintings
items.headline: How to Paint with Acrylic Paints: 9 Simple Step-by-Step Art Lessons Designed Especially for Beginners of All Ages.
objectives_summary: Create 9 amazing acrylic paintings.
Apply the knowledge gained in this course to create unique masterpieces.
Learn interesting facts about the subject of each painting.

items.title: The Art & Science of Figure Drawing: SHADING
items.headline: Use your basic drawing skills to shade the figure and illustrate anatomy using dramatic light & shadow.
objectives_summary: How to use basic shading skills to shade the human body.
How to identify and draw fundamental light & shadow patterns on the figure.
How to create beautiful, fully rendered drawings of the figure using dramatic light & shadow.

items.title: How To Draw Manga & Anime Easily & Quickly
items.headline: Go from beginner to drawing excellent Manga & Anime characters with easy to follow tutorials.
objectives_summary: Draw Manga & Anime quickly & easily. Learn the skills to become a Manga & Anime artist.
